name: Fruity Kid
description:
Downloading the game allows you to play with your unique account and publish your high-scores.

Fruity kids is an arcade platformer. In this game, you have to resolve as much puzzle as possible in time trial. You are playing as a pirate kid and you are resolving puzzle in a ship.

This game has an online leaderboard who allows you to compare your high-scores with your friend's.
